pkgmetadata.longdescription: Simulate Stock-Flow Consistent Models // Routines to write, simulate, and validate stock-flow consistent (SFC) models. The accounting structure of SFC models are described in Godley and Lavoie (2007, ISBN:978-1-137-08599-3). The algorithms implemented to solve the models (Gauss-Seidel and Broyden) are described in Kinsella and O'Shea (2010) doi:10.2139/ssrn.1729205 and Peressini and Sullivan (1988, ISBN:0-387-96614-5).
